titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd to the Protestants of Ireland in the city of London at St. Helens, Octob. 23, 1690 being the day appointed by act of Parliament in Ireland for an anniversary thanksgiving for the deliverence of the Protestants of that kingdom from the bloody massacre begun by the Irish papists on the 23d of October, 1641 / by Richard, Lord Bishop of Killala.
titleStmt.author: Tenison, Richard, 1640?-1705.

titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd to the Protestants of Ireland in the city of London at St. Helens, Octob. 23, 1690 being the day appointed by act of Parliament in Ireland for an anniversary thanksgiving for the deliverence of the Protestants of that kingdom from the bloody massacre begun by the Irish papists on the 23d of October, 1641 / by Richard, Lord Bishop of Killala.
titleStmt.author: Tenison, Richard, 1640?-1705.

notesStmt.note: "Printed at the earnest request of many of the gentry of Ireland."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
